dataquery.name: WorkingQueue
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT FC.CASE_NUMBER AS 'CaseNumber' ,FC.CASE_ID AS 'CaseID' ,FC.CASE_FILING_DT AS 'CaseFilingDate' ,CASE WHEN EBP.STARTING_SEQUENCE = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(EBP.STARTING_SEQUENCE, '|') END AS 'Book' ,CASE WHEN EBP.ENDING_SEQUENCE = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(EBP.ENDING_SEQUENCE, '|') END AS 'Page' ,FC.CASE_SHORT_TITLE AS 'CaseStyle' --,CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), FC.NEXT_SESSION_DATE, 101))) = '' THEN '|' ELSE -- ( CASE WHEN si.SESSION_ITEM_ID IS NULL THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), --FC.NEXT_SESSION_DATE, 101), '|')END ) END AS 'NextSession' ,(SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(A1.ITEM_START_DT) IS NOT NULL THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),MAX(A1.ITEM_START_DT),101) ELSE '|' END FROM ACC_SESSION_ITEM A1 WHERE A1.CASE_ID = FC.CASE_ID) AS 'NextSession' ,CASE WHEN ARP.APPR_DESCRIPTION = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(ARP.APPR_DESCRIPTION, '|') END AS 'AppReason' ,CT.CASE_TYP_DESC AS 'CaseType' ,FC.DATE_TIME_MOD FROM ACM_FACTS_CASE FC LEFT JOIN ACM_PARTY P ON P.CASE_ID = FC.CASE_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_PERSON PERS ON PERS.PERSON_ALIAS_ID = P.PERSON_ALIAS_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_PARTY_ROLE_TYP PRT ON PRT.PARTY_ROLE_TYP_ID = P.PARTY_ROLE_TYP_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_EVENT_TO_CASE ETC ON ETC.CASE_ID = FC.CASE_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_EVENT_BOOK_PAGE EBP ON EBP.EVENT_ENTRY_ID = ETC.EVENT_ENTRY_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_CASE_TYP CT ON FC.CASE_TYP_ID = CT.CASE_TYP_ID LEFT JOIN ACC_SESSION_ITEM SI ON FC.CASE_ID = SI.CASE_ID LEFT JOIN ACC_SESN_ITM_APPR_RESN SIAR ON SIAR.SESSION_ITEM_ID = SI.SESSION_ITEM_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_APPR_REASON ARP ON SIAR.APPR_REASON_ID = ARP.APPR_REASON_ID WHERE CT.CASE_TYP_CD NOT IN ('ADP','COM') AND FC.SEALED_CASE_FLG <> 'Y' AND FC.IS_RESTRICTED_FLG <> 'Y' AND FC.REMOVE_PUBLICACCESS_FLG <> 'Y'

dataquery.name: Incremental
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT FC.CASE_NUMBER AS 'CaseNumber' ,FC.CASE_ID AS 'CaseID' ,FC.CASE_FILING_DT AS 'CaseFilingDate' ,CASE WHEN ETB.BOOK_NUM = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(ETB.BOOK_NUM, '|') END AS 'Book' ,CASE WHEN ETB.PAGE_NUM = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(ETB.PAGE_NUM, '|') END AS 'Page' ,FC.CASE_SHORT_TITLE AS 'CaseStyle' ,CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), FC.NEXT_SESSION_DATE, 101))) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), FC.NEXT_SESSION_DATE, 101), '|') END AS 'NextSession' ,CASE WHEN FC.APPR_REASON = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(FC.APPR_REASON, '|') END AS 'AppReason' ,CT.CASE_TYP_DESC AS 'CaseType' ,FC.DATE_TIME_MOD FROM ACM_FACTS_CASE FC LEFT JOIN ACM_PARTY P ON P.CASE_ID = FC.CASE_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_PERSON PERS ON PERS.PERSON_ALIAS_ID = P.PERSON_ALIAS_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_PARTY_ROLE_TYP PRT ON PRT.PARTY_ROLE_TYP_ID = P.PARTY_ROLE_TYP_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_EVENT_TO_CASE ETC ON ETC.CASE_ID = FC.CASE_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_EVENT_TO_BOOK ETB ON ETB.EVENT_ENTRY_ID = ETC.EVENT_ENTRY_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_CASE_TYP CT ON FC.CASE_TYP_ID = CT.CASE_TYP_ID WHERE CT.CASE_TYP_CD NOT IN ('ADP','COM') AND FC.SEALED_CASE_FLG <> 'Y' AND FC.IS_RESTRICTED_FLG <> 'Y' AND FC.REMOVE_PUBLICACCESS_FLG <> 'Y' AND (P.DATE_TIME_CREATED > DATEADD(HH,-2,GETDATE()) OR P.DATE_TIME_MOD > DATEADD(HH,-2,GETDATE()))
